section.text: *NOTE: This section includes amendments by emergency legislation that will expire on April 12, 2022. To view the text of this section after the expiration of all emergency and emergency legislation, click this link: Permanent Version.*
section.heading: Immunization standards; list of immunizations.
section.text: The Mayor shall, by regulations, specify the immunization standards to be used for compliance with this chapter, and may also, by regulation, revise the list of requested immunizations; provided, that the Mayor may not issue regulations that conflict with the requirements of § 38-502.01.

annotations.annotation: Delegation of Authority pursuant to D.C. Law 3-20, the Immunization of School Students Act of 1979, see Mayor’s Order 2006-117, September 5, 2006 ( 53 DCR 7553).

For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(d) of Coronavirus Immunization of School Students and Early Childhood Workers Regulation Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-280, Jan. 12, 2022, 0 DCR 0).
